Text: FW CITY OF PALO ALTO November Production Sales Cc PST Sorry this should be December Production Original Message From Ewing Linda J Sent Tuesday January PM To Keiser Kam Cc Baxter Bryce Subject CITY OF PALO ALTO November Production Sales Mr Raveen Maan with the City of Palo Alto called stating that all contracts were cancelled at the end of NovSo why are Demand Charges being billed to them plus volumes I will work with Volume for the actuals on this Below listed are deal numbers for the Demand charges Please advise if these should have been billed volumes Thanks Linda J Ewing Specialist Settlements Enron North America ph fx email
